title: Angry Returning Player !?!?!?!?
body:
Doesnt play league in literal months
Comes back and plays a game of xerath and presses ult

Who the hell's idea was it to make xerath's ult to zoom out
At least give me the option of having the old option of no zooming

Theres a huge difference between how Jhin's and Xerath ults work.

With more zoom the less accuracy you have since you lose the precision of having a closer zoom

replies.body: I'm having a hard time figuring out with this title required an interrogation point, let alone 4 interspersed with exclamations.
